content: Write a pantoum about mountains using exactly 80 words.

Mountains stand tall and proud,
Their peaks touching the sky.
Majestic in their solitude,
They whisper secrets to the wind.

Their peaks touching the sky,
They command respect and awe.
They whisper secrets to the wind,
And echo the stories of the earth.

They command respect and awe,
Their strength a testament of time.
And echo the stories of the earth,
Their beauty a timeless muse.

Their strength a testament of time,
Mountains stand tall and proud.
Their beauty a timeless muse,
In their silence, wisdom abounds.
